name: EzMidiPiano
description: An Android app that enables MIDI device connectivity and integrates with the javax.sound.midi API. Built for music enthusiasts and learners.
longDescription: Mobile application that bridges the gap between digital music and traditional piano learning. Enables MIDI device connectivity on Android and provides real-time MIDI processing capabilities.

name: VSCode JSON Unescape
description: VS Code extension to convert escaped JSON strings into pretty, readable JSON and vice versa. A handy tool for developers working with JSON data.
longDescription: Visual Studio Code extension that simplifies working with JSON strings by providing quick conversion between escaped and pretty-formatted JSON. Perfect for developers dealing with API responses and configuration files.
features: Convert escaped JSON to readable format
Convert pretty JSON back to escaped strings

name: Gemini Chat CLI
description: A simple and fun repository that allows users to have conversations with Gemini AI directly in the terminal window. Command-line interface for AI interactions.
longDescription: Terminal-based chat application that integrates with Google's Gemini AI, providing a lightweight and efficient way to interact with AI directly from the command line.
features: Easy to use and set up

name: Pygame Shooting Game
description: A personal pygame project featuring a classic shooting game. Built with Python and Pygame for fun and learning game development.
longDescription: Personal game development project using Pygame framework. Demonstrates game logic, sprite handling, collision detection, and interactive gameplay mechanics.

name: Portfolio Website
description: This modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my work and skills. Built with React and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations and a clean, professional design.
longDescription: A lightweight, performance-focused portfolio site demonstrating modern frontend development practices. Includes contact form integration with backend API.
